name: SARONIC TECHNOLOGIES
sampleDescriptions: Discuss benefits of autonomous surface vessels to enhance maritime awareness, extend reach, and improve survivability for naval operations.

Educate members of Congress and congressional staff on commercial autonomous surface vessels to enhance maritime awareness, extend reach, and improve survivability to U.S. and allied naval fleets.Advo
